name: UP2028285:Billy The Roofer
description:
TDEMO Week 2 submission:

This game is a 2D platformer that uses Spacebar to slow down. The Objective is dodge any obstacles in your way and make it to the end.

This is also my first game so any new additions and things I should improve on would be much appreciated.

Sources

Tile mapping assets:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/pixel-adventure-1-155360

Transforming player to object.

Transforming objects from one position to another.

For more information about the game I have added a devlog discussing this.
